settings.tagline: Create or join a group today!
settings.heading: Tennis & Pickleball Groups
settings.description: Grow your own tennis or pickleball community by creating or joining a UTR Sports group today. From the palm of your hand, connect with local players, track activity, coordinate play, and improve your game.

settings.heading: Create or join
settings.list: Easily find, join, or create private or public groups to connect with like-minded individuals
settings.list2: Level-based groups make it easier to organize play with other local players
settings.list3: Share announcements, videos, and more within your group's feed, fostering engagement and communication among members

settings.heading: Organize & Play
settings.list: Create or sign up for group events, such as meet-ups, hits, matches, and round robins
settings.list2: Customize the date, location, level requirements, max attendees, and more
settings.list3: Invite specific players to join the group or post open invites, allowing anyone who meets your level criteria to register

settings.heading: Track Ratings & Scores
settings.list: Post scores from group events to update your UTR and UTR-P ratings
settings.list2: Check your standing within the group by viewing the member ratings
settings.list3: Track your past activities and participation in group events

settings.description: Join or create groups within your community. Open your UTR Sports app and navigate to the "Communities" section in the bottom tab bar.
settings.list: Find a Group: Easily search for groups using the 'Search groups' screen
settings.list2: My Communities: Access specific communities you're already a member of
settings.list3: Communities Near You: Explore various community groups nearby, filterable by type (groups, clubs, colleges, high schools)

settings.description: Easily find or join a group by tapping the "Find a Group" button on the Communities page.
settings.list: Use filters by sport type, location, or radius to narrow down your search
settings.list2: Simply tap "Join Group" after selecting your desired community to become a member

settings.description: Tap "Create A Group" to create and customize your own group and then invite members.
settings.list: Customize Your Group: Add basic details and a cover photo to personalize your community
settings.list2: Invite Members: Expand your group by inviting others to join your community
settings.list3: Make Your First Post: Share updates, announcements, or discussions to engage with your community right away

settings.heading: How to get started
settings.sub-heading: Create or join a group today!

settings.description: Plan and organize meetups and events
Post announcements, videos and more in your group feed.
Stay on top of your game by monitoring your progress
Create groups to connect with like-minded individuals
See group activity, new members, events and posts.

settings.heading: Find
settings.block-list-items:
• Find local tennis & pickleball groups and enjoy recreational level-based play.
  • Make new friends and grow your community while playing the sport you love.

settings.heading: Create
settings.block-list-items:
• Create your own group and encourage friends to play with you.
  • Easy scheduling, messaging, and posting scores.

settings.heading: JOIN UTR SPORTS
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis & pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.

settings.heading: Join utr sports
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you with the UTR Sports app.

settings.description: What’s the Difference Between UTR Rating & Verified UTR Rating?
You've got 40-year-olds out here and young kids. It's cool seeing everyone able to play together and have a great time!
settings.author: Ryan F

settings.description: UTR Sports is a great way to get back into competitive play!
settings.author: Elmer C

settings.description: Every week I can play and work to increase my UTR Rating. I don't have the opportunity to do this at home.
settings.author: Kim M

settings.description: We're all able to play in the same tournament and cheer each other on. UTR Sports has opened doors to being able to do something as a family.
settings.author: Adam A
